update_context_me_msg

#me
update with scalar
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|scalar1
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|scalar2
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|scalar3

#bot

#me
update with fields
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|field1|value1
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|field2|value2

#bot

#me
add scalar to object
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|field1|value1
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|scalar1

#bot

#me
add object to scalar
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|scalar1
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|field1|value1

#bot

#me
add object to array
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|scalar1
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|scalar2
UPDATE_CUSTOM custom|field1|value1

#bot
